en.FIRSTSTART_DIS: Connecting you to Zilliqa and the Decentralized Web. We’re happy to see you.
en.RESTORE_DIS: Enter your secret word phrase here to restore your vault.
en.RECEIVE_DEPOSIT_DIS: To interact with decentralized applications using ZilPay, you’ll need ZIL coin in your wallet.
en.TRANSFER_DIS: The easiest way to get ZIL is to simply transfer it from another address.
en.BUY_DIS: CoinSwitch is the one-stop destination to exchange more than 300 cryptocurrencies at the best rate.
en.TEST_FAUCET_DIS: Get ZIL from a faucet for the test network.
en.CONNECT_INFO: would like to connect to your account.
en.CONNECT_DIS: This site is requesting access to view your current account address. Always make sure you trust the sites you interact with.
